repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is a Nyāya related text. There is a note before the front folio menting title and other related information abot the manuscript. The information as: Pañcalakṣaṇakroḍa Nyāya Pages 80 line 9 Grantha Glued over the front cover. 6-10 lines per folio. The manuscript could be written by multiple scribes as the hand writing seems different at the end of the manuscript. Manuscript is very fragile hence foliation is lost and it is difficult to say if the text is continues or not. Manuscript ends abruptly.

msItem.title: Pañcalakṣanīkroḍa
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 oṃ hṛdi dhīt? vacchedakatva (1 illegible syllable)dān (3 illegible syllables) pratītvamiti anatiriktavṛttitvaṃ vyāpyatvaṃ tacca (na?) vyāpakatatvaṃ? (3 illegible syllables) (gap of 1 syllable due to damage) vavadavṛtti (1 illegible syllable) tena vat 1v 2 ha prakāratānirupitasya (1 illegible syllable)ndatvāvacchinnanirupitasya yat kiñcitviṣayatva sat prakāśatānumānamiti pratibandhakatāśrutyāvṛttitve ….
msItem.explicit: xv 1 (almost half of the line is cut as the folio is broken) dravyabhāvyakaniṣṭāpaka (gap of two letters as folio damaged) ekatvasaṃkhyāvacchinnapratiṣedha ive (gap of a few letters as folio is damaged) xv 2 (gap of a few letters as folio is damaged) vatāpravartanāviṣayitānirūpitaviṣayatāśālinī prāthamike bodhaḥ . (Folio left blank)

extent.measure: 1 bank folio 2 guard folio 90 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals but mostly lost due to condition of the manuscript.

handNote.desc: Hand writing is not so readable, clusters are so mixed that at some places it is very difficult to decipher exact word.

additions.desc: śubhamastu is written on 1v in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words. The exact numeration is difficult to know so last folio is numered as x.
